evidence.claim: MagicAPI utilizes AWS for their cloud infrastructure services.
The platform follows HIPAA compliance protocols for handling health data securely.
MagicAPI supports FHIR standards for healthcare data integration.
The API documentation shows support for various EDI transaction sets including X12.
Integration patterns available include RESTful APIs for seamless third-party integration.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transactions or specific health data exchange use cases found.
